name: OCKContactStore
desc: A store that performs read/write operations on a contact data type.

items.name: func addContact(Self.Contact, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<Self.Contact>?)
items.desc: Adds a contact asynchronously to the store.

items.name: func addContacts([Self.Contact], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[Self.Contact]>?)
items.desc: Adds an array of contacts asynchronously to the store.

items.name: func updateContact(Self.Contact, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<Self.Contact>?)
items.desc: Updates a contact asynchronously in the store.

items.name: func updateContacts([Self.Contact], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[Self.Contact]>?)
items.desc: Updates an array of contacts asynchronously in the store.

items.name: func deleteContact(Self.Contact, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<Self.Contact>?)
items.desc: Deletes a contact asynchronously from the store.

items.name: func deleteContacts([Self.Contact], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[Self.Contact]>?)
items.desc: Deletes an array of contacts asynchronously from the store.
